K10D0237_H0238:464a-14: de rnams re zhig glo bur du mthong bar zad de /
K10D0237_H0238:464a-17: de ltar ma tshor na log pa'i gnas su ltung ngo //
K10D0237_H0238:464a-19: 'du shes kyi phung po zad de /
K10D0237_H0238:464a-22: sems nam mkha' dang 'dra nas spyod yul gyi gzugs brnyan dang /
K10D0237_H0238:464a-26: ci yod pa thams cad me long la bltas pa bzhin du mthong ngo //
K10D0237_H0238:464a-28: song ba'i rjes kyang med do //
K10D0237_H0238:464a-30: 'du shes kyi khang khyim yin no //
K10D0237_H0238:464a-31: phyi mo nyid kyi sems dper rlabs chad de /
K10D0237_H0238:464a-32: chu dang sa 'dra bar gyur na /
K10D0237_H0238:464a-34: 'du shes kyi phung po zad ces bya'o //
K10D0237_H0238:464a-36: sems can gyi rnyog pa las byung ngo //
K10D0237_H0238:464a-38: phyi mo mi bden pa'i sems shin tu phra zhing mi snang ba las byung ngo //
K10D0237_H0238:464a-41: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i rigs kyi
K10D0237_H0238:464b-0: @464b bu rnams la lha'i bdud rnam pa bcu po
K10D0237_H0238:464b-2: de nas sems las shin tu bsgoms nas skye ba rnams kyi phyi mo la brtags na /
K10D0237_H0238:464b-3: mig gi dbang po la yon tan brgyad brgya yod
K10D0237_H0238:464b-4: pa'i phyir bskal pa brgyad khri tshun chad kyi sems
K10D0237_H0238:464b-6: ji ltar skye ba'i don kyang shes so //
K10D0237_H0238:464b-7: sems can bskal pa brgyad khri tshun chad rgyu med par nga skyes pa yin /
K10D0237_H0238:464b-8: mi'ang mir skye phyugs kyang phyugs su skye /
K10D0237_H0238:464b-11: gnas de rnam pa lnga la shin tu gtsang mar mthong /
K10D0237_H0238:464b-13: mya ngan las 'das pa'i don yin no //
K10D0237_H0238:464b-14: zhes zer te byang chub kyi sems ni /
K10D0237_H0238:464b-15: 'chol te mu stegs pa bcur phung po lnga'i nang
K10D0237_H0238:464b-16: nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam pa lngar 'dzin
K10D0237_H0238:464b-17: pa'i phyin ci log gi snger gyur to //
K10D0237_H0238:464b-19: ting nge 'dzin rnam bcu log par shes pa ni /
K10D0237_H0238:464b-20: de thams cad 'du byed kyi phung po'i sems spyod
K10D0237_H0238:464b-21: pa mtho dman du gyur pa'i phyir de lta bur
K10D0237_H0238:464b-22: gyur te / sems can ma rabs bdag gis drod
K10D0237_H0238:464b-23: ma zin te ma yin pa la yin par bltas
K10D0237_H0238:464b-24: nas 'phags pa'i 'bras bu rdzogs so snyam du bsam
K10D0237_H0238:464b-25: nas rdzun chen po yin te /
K10D0237_H0238:464b-27: khyod la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam pa'i don de khyer la /
K10D0237_H0238:464b-28: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can la bstan te sems kyi bdud mi g-yo bar gyis shig /
K10D0237_H0238:464b-29: nyung du thos pa la chog par mi sems shing /
K10D0237_H0238:464b-30: tshor ba chen po'i rgyal po byed de /
K10D0237_H0238:465a-0: thams cad gtsang gdang ba'i tshon @465a *//
K10D0237_H0238:465a-3: rigs kyi bu rnams ting nge 'dzin sgom pa 'du byed kyi phung po zad pa ni /
K10D0237_H0238:465a-4: 'jig rten gyi g-yo ba dang 'dra bar gyur te /
K10D0237_H0238:465a-5: dbang po drug shin tu gtsang zhing gsog tu gyur nas sems rgod ba'am /
K10D0237_H0238:465a-6: 'dug tu mi btub pa mad par gyur to //
K10D0237_H0238:465a-7: phyi nang ting nge 'dzin mi g-yo bar snang gsal bar gyur to //
K10D0237_H0238:465a-9: phyogs bcu'i sems can gyi rigs kyang rig /
K10D0237_H0238:465a-10: phyogs bcu'i yang rigs mthun par mthong /
K10D0237_H0238:465a-12: rnam par shes pa phung po'i khang khyim zhes bya'o //
K10D0237_H0238:465a-13: sgo drug bsnor zhing spyad du rung /
K10D0237_H0238:465a-15: rang gi lus dang sems mching bu bzhin du gyur te /
K10D0237_H0238:465a-18: rnam par shes pa'i phung po zad ces bya'o //
K10D0237_H0238:465a-19: mi de tshe'i rnyog pa las 'das so //
K10D0237_H0238:465a-21: yang dag pa'i don 'ol byir 'ong ba la mi
K10D0237_H0238:465a-22: bden pa'i sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa las
K10D0237_H0238:465a-25: rigs kyi bu 'du byed thams cad stong par rig
K10D0237_H0238:465a-26: na rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la skye
K10D0237_H0238:465a-27: shi'ang 'gog ste / mi skye ma shi zhi ba
K10D0237_H0238:465a-28: 'gog pa'i don la shin tu ma rgyas pas yang
K10D0237_H0238:465a-31: de'i sems zhen pas mu stegs sa phyi la'i snger gyur te byang chub kyi sems mi 'chol /
K10D0237_H0238:465a-35: dang po sems yod par 'dzin pa'i mu stegs su gyur te /
K10D0237_H0238:465b-0: yang dag @465b pa'i don la rgyab kyis phyogs /
K10D0237_H0238:465b-4: rigs kyi bu 'du byed thams cad stong par rig
K10D0237_H0238:465b-5: nas rnam par shes pa nyid bskyer shi'ang 'gog ste
K10D0237_H0238:465b-6: / mi skye mi shi zhi ba 'gog pa'i don
K10D0237_H0238:465b-7: la shin tu ma rgyas pas yang dag pa nyid
K10D0237_H0238:465b-8: la nga rang nyid yin no //
K10D0237_H0238:465b-10: nam mkha' dang khams so cog gi sems can rigs
K10D0237_H0238:465b-11: bcu gnyis yod pa'ang thams cad nga'i lus las byung
K10D0237_H0238:465b-13: de'i sems la zhen pas na mu stegs ma he shor ba'i lugs su gyur to //
K10D0237_H0238:465b-14: lus grangs med par sprul te 'khor du byas nas byang chub kyi sems ni /
K10D0237_H0238:465b-19: dang 'og byed nus pa'i sems dang /
K10D0237_H0238:465b-20: don sgrub nus pa'i 'bras bur gyur te /
K10D0237_H0238:465b-21: yang dag par mya ngan las 'das nus pa la ni rgyab kyis phyogs /
K10D0237_H0238:465b-22: nga rgyal chen po'i lhar skye'o //
K10D0237_H0238:465b-23: yang rigs kyi bu 'du byed thams cad stong par
K10D0237_H0238:465b-24: rig nas rnam par shes pa nyid la skye shi'ang
K10D0237_H0238:465b-25: 'gog ste / mi skye mi shi zhi ba'i sems ni /
K10D0237_H0238:465b-26: dbar ma ching bu gtsang ma'i nang na rin po che'i zla ba yod pa dang 'dra'o //
K10D0237_H0238:465b-27: de bzhin du gyur na byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa bcu /
K10D0237_H0238:465b-31: byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10D0237_H0238:465b-32: snyoms pa'i tshor ba'i sa las 'das nas de bzhin
K10D0237_H0238:465b-33: gshegs pa'i snang ba rgyas pa la zhugs te rgyan
K10D0237_H0238:466a-0: gyis brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi mtsho ci'ang @466a *//
K10D0237_H0238:466a-1: thob pa med pa'i don thob nas sangs rgyas snga ma 'das pa'i zhi gnas dang /
K10D0237_H0238:466a-2: lhag mthong gi nang nas shin tu phra ba'i bdud kyi las dang /
K10D0237_H0238:466a-3: bdud du snang ba'i tshe kun shes rig nas sems
K10D0237_H0238:466a-4: kyi dri ma bkrus bsal te log par lta ba'i
K10D0237_H0238:466a-5: nang du mi lhung zhing phung po'i bdud ni /
K10D0237_H0238:466a-8: snyil grugs [?] che rnams kyi nang du mi skye ste /
K10D0237_H0238:466a-9: thal byung byang chub tu grub kyi bar du mchog pa med do //
K10D0237_H0238:466a-10: mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i sems ni /
K10D0237_H0238:466a-11: gsal zhing mi 'chol bar 'gyur ro can gyi dbang po ni /
K10D0237_H0238:466a-15: ting nge 'dzin ma rig pa'i phyir na log pa'i gnas su ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0237_H0238:466a-17: khyod kyis nga'i sngags [?] 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la ston cig /
K10D0237_H0238:466a-18: nga'i sngags 'di kha ton du byed ma nus na /
K10D0237_H0238:466a-19: yi ger bris te lus la btags sam /
K10D0237_H0238:466a-20: ting nge 'dzin sgom pa'i khang bu [?] na; phyogs
K10D0237_H0238:466a-21: bcu'i lha'i bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyang zhu
K10D0237_H0238:466a-22: byang ste / gnod pa byed mi nus so //
K10D0237_H0238:466a-25: sems can thams cad kyi phyir khyod ma ba re
K10D0237_H0238:466a-26: [?] gtsug tor chen po'i bam po dgu pa las
K10D0237_H0238:466a-27: / bdud kyi le'u nyi tshe phyung ba rdzogs so ////
